Murdoch’s News of the World Editors Admit to Phone-Hacking - 3 sr editors of Murdoch’s defunct 'News of the World' plead guilty to hacking into phone messages of politicians, royals, crime victims & movie stars. Admissions prove for 1st time that hacking was at the heart of media empire.
